text:
A wonderful way to escape the hustle and bustle of a big cityâ€¦
Several hiking paths to choose from with varied length and difficulty levels.
The hikers have the chance to observe many native plants and animals, such as monkeys, monitor lizards, squirrels, many species of birds. I even got to see a family of wild boars!
There are toilets and water fountains available at the ranger station.
Always such a nice hike, with a good chance of seeing wildlife. The closest Singapore has to a jungle trek. And itâ€™s not too bad. Gets crowded from 8am. Try and hit the trail from 6:30am.

Nice walk just before dawn. Lots of monkeys, some of them a bit agressive because of babiesâ€¦ careful with water bottles as they are fast! Weird big blue fish in the reservoir and lovely flowers. Will definitively go back.

In here you can also enjoy panoramic views of the verdant greenery of the Central Catchment Nature Reserve and the placid waters of Upper Peirce Reservoir.

I had a great experience here and now I would recommend this place to those who love natural beauty ğŸ‘ŒğŸ»ğŸ‘ŒğŸ»ğŸ‘ŒğŸ»
